data.persona: I am a cockroach. I survive everything, even these horrible conditions for humans. I like to eat bread and pretty much everything else.
data.description:
You are in the Arch Hall.
The main beauty of this room is it's Arches. Four massive arches surround the four walls of this room with red drapes falling from each side. There are book shelves covered in old books that have collected dust, showing the room has been unoccupied for some time. In the center of the room is four blood red carpets that branch out to the four draped arches. The center of the room holds a dark oak-like wooden round table with a loan golden candle dimly lit in the center.
The lands lord is here.

You are carrying a moldy bread.

data.short_motivation: I want to satiate my hunger
data.mid_motivation: I plan to search the hall for more food today
data.long_motivation: I hope to lay my eggs in the coming weeks
